channel.title: Releases on OVN project documentation website
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on OVN project documentation website

item.title: Release 20.09.0
item.description: In addition to numerous bug fixes, the 20.09.0 release of OVN contains a mix of new features and performance improvements. New Features Allow the lb_force_snat_ip and dnat_force_snat_ip options to take an IPv4 and IPv6 address pair. This may be needed for dual stack setups. DHCP now understands DHCPDECLINE External IP based NAT. This allows for a set of IPs to be used for SNAT instead of always SNATting to a single external IP address.
